item.description: Would like to get a nice pace going for this, say 14-18 MPH. So for those of you who are looking to do a century, be it metric or standard this is a chance to see how you do on a nice brisk ride ( I could go faster if you want). Would like to start at the first parking lot on Veterans Memorial Parkway. This is a decent place to start. I would also like to do a loop or 2 through Colt State park, just to add a mile or two more. This will also include a stop for people to take a small break if they feel the need to do so. This is also weather permitting. If it rains, its a no go. If its just a litttle cold, ITS ON.
item.name: Bike East Bay Bike Path/Colt Park 12:00 PM
